projects.title: Generative Music Application!
projects.description: This was a complete project that was solo designed & developed. Everything was designed to be simple and approachable to users, and this we evaluated through multiples feedback interviews. Check the link for more!

projects.title: Add more sections!
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.
